and.sqlCheck: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT (COUNT(1) IS NOT NULL) AS X FROM listdata l GROUP BY listid HAVING MAX(entryid)!=COUNT(entryid) LIMIT 1) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.routines WHERE routine_schema = DATABASE() AND specific_name = 'check_listentry_sequence';

changeSet.comment: Create stored procedure to correct any entryno that are not in sequence

changeSet.author: rowena

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.routines WHERE routine_schema = DATABASE() AND specific_name = 'check_listentry_sequence';

changeSet.sql: CALL check_listentry_sequence();

changeSet.author: rowena

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.routines WHERE routine_schema = DATABASE() AND specific_name = 'check_listentry_sequence';

changeSet.sql: DROP PROCEDURE check_listentry_sequence;

changeSet.author: rowena

and.sqlCheck: SELECT CASE WHEN ( SELECT stock_id FROM stock s GROUP BY project_id HAVING MAX(CAST(uniquename AS UNSIGNED))!=COUNT(CAST(uniquename AS UNSIGNED)) AND stock_id NOT IN ( SELECT stock_id FROM nd_experiment nd WHERE nd.stock_id = stock_id ) LIMIT 1 ) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.routines WHERE routine_schema = DATABASE() AND specific_name = 'check_stockentry_sequence';

changeSet.comment: Create stored procedure to correct any entryno (uniquename) that are not in sequence

changeSet.author: rowena

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.routines WHERE routine_schema = DATABASE() AND specific_name = 'check_stockentry_sequence';

changeSet.sql: CALL check_stockentry_sequence();

changeSet.author: rowena

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.routines WHERE routine_schema = DATABASE() AND specific_name = 'check_stockentry_sequence';

changeSet.sql: DROP PROCEDURE check_stockentry_sequence;
